3.5.The Tapas was OK.  We scored a seat on the patio, and the waiter will come out and get you drinks.  Then you go to the bar and grab stuff.  They ask you the table number and bring it out to you after heating the items in.  Bacon and fried quail egg on bread was not only cute but delish. Salt cod croquettes were crispy and creamy.  Very cheap and cheerful.  But beware, part of the patio sits over a sewer and it can become a little smelly at times.
